籤詩版本二:
Masamba a mitengo ya mkuyu agwa, nthawi yophukira yayandikira, ndipo ulendo wobwerera wa apaulendo ukuoneka ngati mitambo.
Chifukwa cha khama lalikulu la Mulungu, ngalawayo inabwerera ndi chumacho mumphepo.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chithunzi cha masamba akugwa a mkuyu.
Chilichonse chimakhala choipa pasadakhale komanso chabwino pamapeto pake.
解曰: Tengani zinthu kuchokera pansi pamtima. Tianxin amatsatira. Kupeza zofunika pamoyo. Chitani chilichonse chomwe mungathe.

◇Mphepo imawomba ku Tengwang Pavilion
Wang Bo, dzina laulemu Zian, anali wolemba ndakatulo wa mzera wa Tang woyambirira. Iye anabadwa m'chaka choyamba cha Yonghui, Emperor Gaozong wa Tang Dynasty. Iye anaimbira Mfumu Guan kuti: “Nditagwira maloko atatu a ndevu zobiriwira, ndikuwerenga mbiri ya ufumu wa Qing ku nyali yobiriwira ndi kupereka ulemu kwa mayina otchuka. Kugwira chinjoka chobiriwira ndi mwezi m’manja mwanga.” kuti m'dzinja la chaka chino, Wang Bo adachoka ku Shanxi kupita ku Hainan Island kukachezera abambo ake omwe adatsitsidwa kupita ku boma la Jiaozhi, ndikudutsa m'mapiri ndi mitsinje masauzande panjira.
